name: Quantum mazes
description:
Welcome to the quantum maze! Where is the maze I hear you ask?  Well, still in its many quantum states, awaiting your direction. Start exploring and the maze will begin to "collapse" around you, with walls materialising in positions dictated by your chosen route.  Can you successfully build and navigate the maze - both at the same time?

  • Number of puzzles: 3
  • Average play time: 45 mins 
  • First published: 2010 (itch.io relaunch: August 2021)
  • Original:  http://www.clickmazes.com/quantum/new-quantum.htm
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

puzzlescript implementation - Matthieu Haller - 2021
original concept and puzzle designs - Jonathan Welton - 1990-2010
based on an original applet - Andrea Gilbert - 2010
